      • getInstructorsLessons

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}/lessons")
public java.util.List<Lesson> getInstructorsLessons(@PathVariable
                                                                                       java.lang.String id,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="since")
                                                                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> since,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="from")
                                                                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> from,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="to")
                                                                                       java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> to)
        List lessons of instructor.

        When since is used, from and to cannot be used too. From and to have to be used together.

        Allowed for every role.

        Parameters:
        id - id an unique id of instructor.
        since - optional date since.
        from - optional date from.
        to - optional date to.
        Returns:
        list of lessons.

      • createLesson

        @PostMapping(value="/{id}/lessons")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\')")
public Lesson createLesson(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                    java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                                    Lesson lesson,
                                                                                                                    org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
                                                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Create new lesson.

        Instructors are allowed to create lessons only for themselves.

        Accessible only by instructor.

        Parameters:
        id - id of instructor.
        lesson - lesson to create.
        auth - security object containing principal.
        Returns:
        new lesson.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if id in lesson is not same as id of calling instructor.

      • deleteLesson

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}/lessons/{startTime}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public Lesson deleteLesson(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                     @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                     java.lang.String startTime,
                                                                                                                                                     org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
                                                                                                                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete lesson.

        Admin without restrictions, instructor may delete only his own lessons.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id of instructor.
        startTime - unique start time for specified instructor.
        auth - security object which contains principal.
        Returns:
        deleted lesson.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if instructors id is wrong.

      • addStudentToLesson

        @PostMapping(value="/{id}/lessons/{startTime}/student/{studentId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public Lesson addStudentToLesson(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String startTime,
                                                                                                                                                                             @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String studentId,
                                                                                                                                                                             org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
                                                                                                                                                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Register student to lesson.

        Admin - no restrictons, instructor only to himself.

        Parameters:
        id - of instructor in lesson.
        startTime - start time of lesson.
        studentId - student who should be registered.
        auth - security object which contains principal.
        Returns:
        updated lesson instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if instructor id is wrong.

      • addInvokingStudentToLesson

        @PostMapping(value="/{id}/lessons/{startTime}/student/me")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasRole(\'ROLE_STUDENT\')")
public Lesson addInvokingStudentToLesson(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String startTime,
                                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
                                                                                                                                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Register calling student to lesson.

        Id of calling student is extracted from jwt.

        Allowed only to student.

        Parameters:
        id - id of instructor.
        startTime - start time.
        auth - security object which contains principal.
        Returns:
        updated lesson.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if deleting wrong lesson.

      • deleteStudentFromLesson

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}/lessons/{startTime}/student/{studentId}")
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROLE_INSTRUCTOR\', \'ROLE_ADMIN\')")
public Lesson deleteStudentFromLesson(@PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String startTime,
                                                                                                                                                                                    @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                                                                    java.lang.String studentId,
                                                                                                                                                                                    org.springframework.security.core.Authentication auth)
                                                                                                                                                                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete student from lesson.

        Admin - no restrictions, instructor - only his student.

        Parameters:
        id - id of instructor.
        startTime - starting time of lesson.
        studentId - id of student to be removed.
        auth - security object which contains principal.
        Returns:
        updated lesson.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - wrong instructor id.
